definitions: Archaic third-person singular simple present indicative form of believe.
To have faith or confidence in someone or something.
To accept something as true or real.
examples: He that believeth on me, the works that I do shall he do also.
The scripture saith, Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed.
For verily I say unto you, Till heaven and earth pass, one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law, till all be fulfilled.
